Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by hameneggs Hi My mom just had a mammogram injury and is awaiting her surgery to repair a torn tendon in her left arm. Any exchange of information would be appreciated. Thanks. Sorry to say this but a lawyer will prove that over use of a arm can cause a torn tendon in arm,that it was all about bad timing. Torn tendon in the arm is not that uncommen with people.
